name: Remote Rotary Saw
tags: beam6, kinetic7, merc, ind, SR, damage_special
customPrimary: The saw blade continually deals %s damage per second as long as the fire button is held down, releasing the button shoots out the blade dealing %s damage on a hit.

name: Deployable Demolition Rocket Pod
customPrimary: After triggering this missile's proximity sensor a Jackhammer equipped turret is deployed which lasts up to 30 seconds.

name: Deployable Demolition Rocket Pod (Single)
customPrimary: After triggering this missile's proximity sensor a Jackhammer equipped turret is deployed which lasts up to 30 seconds.

name: Stasis Beam
tags: beam0, energy0, damage_special, damage_soft_flux, merc, ind
customPrimary: When not hitting shields the target is put into stasis, rendering it incapacitated and immune to all damage for as long as the beam fires plus 5 seconds.

name: Laser Web MIRV
customPrimary: The missile splits into %s smart submunitions which form a tight web of lasers with a diameter of %s effective against missiles, fighters and strike craft.

name: Welding Beam
customPrimary: When all sub-beams impact a target in close proximity to each other, the spalling effect produces a small explosion dealing an additional 5 pints of high explosive damage.

name: Plasma Cutter
customPrimary: After a short delay targeting lasers are deployed and plasma bolts are fired as long as the button is held down with a fire rate equal to %s. Each bolt deals an additional %s damage to armor. This damage is not reduced by armor.

name: omm_plasma_cutter_sub
customPrimary: Each bolt deals an additional %s damage to armor. This damage is not reduced by armor.

name: Chaff Flak
customPrimary: Reduces energy and beam damage dealt by enemies in a %s area. Allied ships in the area receive reduced energy, beam and EMP damage. The reduction equals %s linearly falling off to %s over %s after which the chaff wears off.
